item.title: Report X-2025030263
item.description:
Report X-2025030263

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-05
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KY, TWO PACKAGES FROM TAIWAN WERE INSPECTED BY IMPORT CUSTOMS OFFICIALS. INVOICE AND THERMAL LABEL STATES PLASTIC BOTTLES ARE BEING IMPORTED. CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALS TWO HUNDRED BUTANE LIGHTERS IN EACH BOX. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER TO THE SAME CONSIGNEE IN GEORGIA IS 1Z7ER4830430779054.
